report.title: Filterable samples count per user/website combination.
report.description: Return a count of samples the user has created on a given website. Report can be supplied a filter from the filters table.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE s.website_id=#website_id# AND s.created_by_id=#user_id# AND s.parent_sample_id IS NULL #idlist#
